languages.text: "Возможно... Если бы элантах не принял{mf||а} меня в свой круг, я бы стала подобной тебе и окончательно потеряла себя. Но теперь у меня есть надежда, так что оставь свои праздные речи... кузен".

"Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."
languages.original_text: "Возможно... Если бы элантах не принял{mf||а} меня в свой круг, я бы стала подобной тебе и окончательно потеряла себя. Но теперь у меня есть надежда, так что оставь свои праздные речи... кузен".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果……如果外界人没有接纳我进入{mf|他|她}的圈子，我或许会变得像你一样，彻底迷失自我。但现在，我的心里仍有希望，你就省省嘴皮子吧……表哥。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

traits.locale_text: “如果……如果外界人没有接纳我进入{mf|他|她}的圈子，我或许会变得像你一样，彻底迷失自我。但现在，我的心里仍有希望，你就省省嘴皮子吧……表哥。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être... Peut-être que si l'elantach ne m'avait pas acceptée dans son cercle, j'aurais perdu toute notion de qui je suis et je serais devenue comme vous. Mais maintenant, j'ai retrouvé espoir, alors épargnez-moi vos persiflages... cousin. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être... Peut-être que si l'elantach ne m'avait pas acceptée dans son cercle, j'aurais perdu toute notion de qui je suis et je serais devenue comme vous. Mais maintenant, j'ai retrouvé espoir, alors épargnez-moi vos persiflages... cousin. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht ... Wenn {mf|der Elantach mich nicht in seinen|die Elantach mich nicht in ihren} Kreis aufgenommen hätte, wäre ich vielleicht wie Euch geworden und hätte mich selbst völlig verloren. Doch nun habe ich Hoffnung, also erspart mir Eure vergebenen Worte ... Vetter."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ... Wenn {mf|der Elantach mich nicht in seinen|die Elantach mich nicht in ihren} Kreis aufgenommen hätte, wäre ich vielleicht wie Euch geworden und hätte mich selbst völlig verloren. Doch nun habe ich Hoffnung, also erspart mir Eure vergebenen Worte ... Vetter."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「恐らく…恐らくエランタが私を{mf|彼|彼女}の輪に受け入れてくれなかったら、私もあなたのように完全に我を失っていたでしょうね。でも、今は希望がある。だからむなしい言葉はやめて…」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

traits.locale_text: 「恐らく…恐らくエランタが私を{彼|彼女}の輪に受け入れてくれなかったら、私もあなたのように完全に我を失っていたでしょうね。でも、今は希望がある。だからむなしい言葉はやめて…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez... Tal vez si {mf|el|la} elantach no me hubiera aceptado en su círculo me habría convertido en un ser como tú y me hubiera perdido por completo. Pero ahora tengo esperanza, así que puedes ahorrarte las palabras vanas... primo».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez... Tal vez si {mf|el|la} elantach no me hubiera aceptado en su círculo me habría convertido en un ser como tú y me hubiera perdido por completo. Pero ahora tengo esperanza, así que puedes ahorrarte las palabras vanas... primo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."

languages.text: "Olabilir... Belki de elantach beni yanına almasa senin gibi olur ve kendimi tümüyle kaybederdim. Lakin artık umudum var, o yüzden nafile laflarını kendine sakla. Kuzen..."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... Perhaps if the elantach had not accepted me into {mf|his|her} circle, I would have become like you and lost myself completely. But now I have hope, so spare me your futile words... cousin."
